extShortDesc.message: A permission-less content blocker. Blocks ads, trackers, miners, and more immediately upon installation.
extShortDesc.description: this will be in the Chrome web store: must be 132 characters or less

perRulesetStats.description: Appears aside each filter list in the _3rd-party filters_ pane

popupTipReport.message: Report an issue on this website

popupTipSaveRules.message: Click to make your changes permanent.

popupMoreButton.description: Label to be used to show popup panel sections

popupGrantGreatPowers.message:
Click to grant uBO Lite extended permissions on this site.
Extended permissions allow more effective content blocking.
popupGrantGreatPowers.description: Label to be used to show popup panel sections

popupRevokeGreatPowers.message: Click to revoke extended permissions on this site
popupRevokeGreatPowers.description: Label to be used to show popup panel sections

popupLessButton.description: Label to be used to hide popup panel sections

settingsIconBadgePrompt.message: Show the number of blocked requests on the icon
settingsIconBadgePrompt.description: English: Show the number of blocked requests on the icon

settingsAppearance.description: Section for controlling user interface appearance

settingsThemeLabel.description: Label for checkbox to enable a custom dark theme

settingsThemeAccent0Label.description: Label for checkbox to pick an accent color

omnipotenceLabel.message: Enable extended filtering on all websites
omnipotenceLabel.description: Header for a ruleset section in 'Filter lists pane'

omnipotenceLegend.message: uBO Lite can apply extended filtering on a given website only after you explicitly grant the extension permissions to modify data on that website. This setting allows you to grant permissions for extended filtering to all websites at once.
omnipotenceLegend.description: Header for a ruleset section in 'Filter lists pane'

3pGroupRegions.description: Header for a ruleset section in 'Filter lists pane'

1pFormatHint.message: One filter per line. A filter can be a plain hostname, or an EasyList-compatible filter. Lines prefixed with ! will be ignored.
1pFormatHint.description: Short information about how to create custom filters

whitelistPrompt.message: The trusted site directives dictate on which web pages uBO Lite should be disabled. One entry per line.
whitelistPrompt.description: A concise description of the 'Trusted sites' pane.

whitelistExportFilename.description: The default filename to use for import/export purpose

aboutSourceCode.description: Link text to source code repo

aboutFilterLists.description: Link text to uBO's own filter lists repo

firstRunSectionLabel.description: The header text for the welcome message section

firstRunDescription.message: You have just installed uBO Lite. Here you can choose the default filtering mode to use on all websites. By default, Basic mode is selected because it does not require the permission to read and modify data. If you trust uBO Lite, you can give it broad permission to read and modify data on all websites in order to enable more advanced filtering capabilities for all websites by default.
firstRunDescription.description: Descriptive text shown at first install time only

defaultFilteringModeSectionLabel.description: The header text for the default filtering mode section

defaultFilteringModeDescription.message: The default filtering mode will be overridden by per-website filtering modes. You can adjust the filtering mode on any given website according to whichever mode works best on that website. Each mode has its advantages and disadvantages.
defaultFilteringModeDescription.description: This describes the default filtering mode setting

basicFilteringModeDescription.message:
Basic network filtering from selected filter lists.

Does not require permission to read and modify data on websites.

optimalFilteringModeDescription.message:
Advanced network filtering plus specific extended filtering from selected filter lists.

Requires broad permission to read and modify data on all websites.

completeFilteringModeDescription.message:
Advanced network filtering plus specific and generic extended filtering from selected filter lists.

Requires broad permission to read and modify data on all websites.

Generic extended filtering may cause higher webpage resources usage.

behaviorSectionLabel.description: The header text for the 'Behavior' section

autoReloadLabel.message: Automatically reload page when changing filtering mode
autoReloadLabel.description: Label for a checkbox in the options page
